result.eng: Would you like to win the lottery?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat an crannchur a bhuachan
result.orig: ar mhaith leat an crannchur a bhuachan
result.html: ar mhaith leat an crannchur a bhuachanWould you like to win the lottery?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat an crannċur a ḃuaċanWould you like to win the lottery?

result.eng: I wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
result.ga: níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachan
result.orig: níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachan
result.html: níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachanI wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
result.ponchtml: níor ṁiste liom an crannċur a ḃuaċanI wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
